# TRC Workbench Project Instructions

This is a React TypeScript application for a Technology Risk and Control workbench featuring:
- Configurable widget system with drag-and-drop capabilities
- TRC Calendar widget for events management (Audits, Recertifications, CORE issues)
- Professional, vibrant UI design
- Admin functionality for event management
- User preferences and personalization

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React best practices with hooks and functional components
- Implement comprehensive testing (unit and integration)
- Use modern UI libraries for professional appearance
- Ensure responsive design and accessibility
- Configuration-driven widget system for extensibility

## Project Status
✅ Next.js TypeScript project scaffolded successfully with Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and App Router
✅ Core dependencies installed (React, TypeScript, UI libraries, drag-and-drop, calendar)
✅ Dashboard layout system implemented with grid-based drag-and-drop widgets
✅ TRC Calendar widget built with full event management capabilities
✅ Professional styling and animations added
✅ Comprehensive test suite created with Jest and React Testing Library
✅ Admin functionality implemented for event CRUD operations
✅ Configuration system for widgets and user preferences
✅ Modern theme system with vibrant, professional design

## Key Features Implemented
1. **Dashboard Management**: Configurable widget layouts with drag-and-drop
2. **TRC Calendar**: Full-featured calendar with event types (Audits, Recertifications, CORE issues)
3. **Event Management**: Create, edit, delete events with priority levels and status tracking
4. **Admin Controls**: Template-based event creation, bulk operations, advanced filtering
5. **Persistent State**: Zustand store with localStorage persistence
6. **Professional UI**: Modern design with animations, responsive layout, accessibility
7. **Testing**: Comprehensive test suite covering components and user workflows

## Ready for Development
The application is fully functional and ready for:
- Backend API integration
- Additional widget types
- Advanced user management
- Real-time notifications
- Mobile responsiveness enhancements
